data:

Date: Mon, 04 Mar 2019 01:13:00 GMT
Server: Apache
Location: https://www.copeland.gov.uk
Content-Length: 235
Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1

http.title: 301 Moved Permanently
http.html:
Moved Permanently

The document has moved here.

Skip to main content

Header menu

  • Home
  • Help
  • Listen to this page
  • FAQs
  • Contact Us

info@copeland.gov.uk

Main menu

  • Services
  • Business
  • My property
  • Your council

  • Services

    • Benefits

    • Building Control

    • Council tax

    • Environmental health

    • Housing

    • Licensing

    • Quick links

  • Business

    • Starting a business

    • Advice if you are already in business

    • Townscape Heritage Initiative

    • Doing business with the council

    • Best Bar None

    • Land and property for sale or rent

  • My property

    • Lookup your councillor, etc. using your postcode or street

    • My bin collections

    • Local amenities and locations

    • Terms and conditions of use

  • Your council

    • Council constitution

    • Our offices

    • Policies and strategies

    • Finance

    • Data transparency

    • List of committees

    • Copeland councillors and MEP's

    • Elections and election results

    • Consultations

Manage your council tax online

Don't lose your right to vote

Welcome

We have launched a new Pest Control Service - click here for more information.

We have recently participated in a Corporate Peer Challenge, through the Local Government Association. Click here to view our feedback report.

Click here to find out more about our kerbside recycling service. Our detailed leaflet is here.

Click here to find out more about the Best Bar None scheme for licensees in Whitehaven.

Click here to view the public inspection advert for our 2017/18 accounts.

We have published a new Privacy Notice which explains how we use and protect your information. Click here for more information. Our Electoral Services department has also published a Privacy Notice which can be found here.

We are encouraging residents to take pride in our borough and make Copeland a better place to live, work and visit for details of the Copeland Pride of Place campaign click here.

Click here for the Public Body Homeless Referral and Self-Referral Link.

Click here to view our current vacancies. 

Click here to see the monthly electoral registration dates for anyone wishing to apply to be added to the Electoral Register. 

We sometimes need to hold parts of our meetings in private. Click here and here to find out which items will be in private at upcoming meetings.

Want to be the first to hear the latest Copeland Council news? Get our Copeland Matters magazine straight to your inbox here.
